library(RPostgreSQL)
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")
source("chart_functions.R")

pillars_conn <- connect_to_db("rjs_pillars")

df <- dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM report_stoprates_age_race_ficard_person")
meta<-dbGetQuery(pillars_conn, "SELECT * FROM metadata_race_labels")

df<-df%>%
  left_join(meta, by=c("race"="race_base"))%>%
  filter(race!='sswana' & race !="nhpi" & race != 'aian') ### Responding to QA: Filtering out for now

race_levels<-c("latinx","nh_asian","nh_black","nh_nhpi","nh_white", "aian", "nh_aian", "nhpi", "nh_nhpi", "sswana", "nh_sswana", "nh_twoormor")
race_labels<-c("latinx","nh_asian","nh_black","nh_nhpi","nh_white", "aian", "nh_aian", "nhpi", "nh_nhpi", "sswana", "nh_sswana", "nh_twoormor")
df$race<-factor(df$race, ordered=TRUE, 
                                               levels=race_levels, labels=race_labels)



text <- "Across all field interviews of people <b> ages {point.age_bracket:.1f} </b>, SDPD stopped people perceived as <b>{point.race_label_short:.1f} {point.rate:.1f}% of the time.</b>"

tooltip_text <- sapply(strwrap(text, 110, simplify=FALSE), paste, collapse="<br>")

## manual code to get the ylim in correct order ##

group_colors <- c(meteorite, orange, peridot, lavender, ccblue, "#5F3B63","#A8683C", "#D58424", "#FF9900")


chart<-hchart(df, 
         "bar", hcaes(x = age_bracket, y = rate, group =race_label_short),
         stacking = "normal",
         tooltip =  list(headerFormat='',pointFormat=tooltip_text)) %>%
    
    hc_title(
      text = "SDPD is disproportionately stopping and conducting field interview cards for Black and Latinx youth relative to general population") %>%
    
    hc_subtitle(
      text = "Percent of stops resulting in a field interview card by age and race") %>%
    
    hc_caption(
      text = paste0(racenote,"<br><br>", sourcenote, "<br>","Analysis for all officer-initiated stops that only resulted in a field interview card completed.","<br>")) %>%
    
    hc_yAxis(max=100,
             title = list(text = paste0(""))) %>%
    
    hc_xAxis( categories=list("17 and under","18-24","25-34","35-44","45-54", "55-64", "65 and older"),
              title = list(text = paste0(""),
                          labels=list(position="bottom"))) %>%
    
    hc_legend(enabled = TRUE, 
              reversed =  TRUE,
              x=20)%>% 
    
    hc_add_theme(cc_theme)%>%
    
    hc_colors(group_colors) %>%
    hc_chart(
      marginRight=120) %>%
    
    hc_exporting(
      enabled = TRUE, sourceWidth=900, sourceHeight=600, 
      chartOptions=list(plotOptions=list(series=list(dataLabels=list(enabled=TRUE,format='{point.rate:.1f}%')))),
      filename = paste0("Percent of stops resulting in a field interview card by age and race","_Catalyst California, catalystcalifornia.org, 2023."),
      buttons=list(contextButton=list(menuItems=list('downloadPNG', 'downloadSVG',
                                                     'downloadXLS', 'downloadCSV'))))

dbDisconnect(pillars_conn)
